The picture was posted two years earlier: not during the COVID-19 pandemic, indicating that it was not recent.
Internet detectives conducted reverse: image searches and found that the picture was identical to one originally taken by the food blogger The Episodic Eater and reposted by Buca di Beppo in 2017, suggesting that Musk did not take the photo himself.
Buca di Beppo responded to Musk: s tweet with a joke about establishing a restaurant franchise on Mars, implying that they were not upset about Musk using their photo.
